team.label: Select team of this hero
team.help: Select a team for this hero

champion.label: Select what champion you want to play.
champion.help: This field indicates champion that will be selected for this bot.

lane.label: Where do I play?
lane.help: This field tells the framework where does this hero play (which lane).

roles.label: What role do I play?
roles.help: This field tells the framework what roles this hero plays.

logger_classpath.label: Please type in classpath of the root of your logger.
logger_classpath.help: While starting execution of the bots the framework will initialize a logger that will be used by the bot and all the other classes that are under the given classpath.Example: com.google to log com.google.ExampleClass ...

class.label: Please type in class of your bot.
class.help: While starting server, the bot object will be initialized to instance of this class. This is class which handles requests from the game and serves as main entry point for bot data. (Should be extension of BaseBot for now)
